snippet: Uneasy over India's weak recovery from its slowest growth since the 1980s, the governor of the central bank said containing inflation was a prerequisite.
lead_paragraph: Uneasy over India's weak recovery from its slowest growth since the 1980s, the governor of the central bank said containing inflation was a prerequisite.

headline.main: India's Central Bank Holds Interest Rates Steady
headline.print_headline: India's Central Bank Holds Interest Rates Steady
